column1: Little Goat Diner////The Hubs and I shared 2 sammies
column2: the Los Drowned (braised beef with havarti cheese
column4: avocado and probably something else...it was EXCELLENT!)
column5: and their special Grilled Cheese (also DEE-LISH
column6: tasted like an amazing grilled cheese & tomato soup all in one).  We shared an order of their fries which are smoked fries...they were tasty but to me they tasted exactly like those TGIFridays Potato Skins Potato Chips.  Still good but for the amount you get I don't think they were worth $6.  Now
column7: did we NEED more fries? No..we were plenty full so at least they saved us from ourselves. ;)
